name: babydoll dress
notes:
**size**
s (m) l (xl) 2xl

**measurements**
chest: 100 (108) 121 (134) 142 cm / 39.4” (42.5”) 47.6” (52.8”) 55.9” 
skirt length: 50 cm / 19.7” or desired length

the dress is designed with a loose fit. the following measurements are for the actual dress, not your size when pulling the measuring tape snug around your chest. 

**materials**
3 (3) 3 (4) 4 skeins of friends cotton silk color 113
8 (8) 9 (9) 9 skeins of friends kid silk color 113

**hooks**
crochet hook 4 mm / us g/6 
crochet hook 5 mm / us h/8

**yarn quality**
friends cotton silk, hobbii
77 % cotton, 23 % silk
50 g / 1.8 oz = 120 m / 131 yds

friends kid silk, hobbii
72 % mohair, 25 % silk, 3 % wool
25 g / 0.9 oz = 200 m / 219 yds

**gauge**
friends cotton silk and 4 mm / us g/6 crochet hook: 
17 sts x 8 rows = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4” x 4”

friends kid silk and 5 mm / us h/8 crochet hook: 
14 sts x 8 rows = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4” x 4”

before blocking, in the v-stitch texture used in pattern

**pattern information**
this design is a top-down construction with a beautiful and airy v-stitch texture . the foundation chain is your neckline. you will be crocheting in the round.
